verses.verse: And in that day <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt say <S%H559><s%>, I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; for though thou wast angry <S%H599><s%> with me <S%H639><s%>, thine anger is turned away <S%H7725><s%> and thou comfortest me <S%H5162><s%>.

Behold <S%H410><s%>, God is my salvation <S%H3444><s%>; I will trust <S%H982><s%>, and will not be afraid <S%H6342><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>, even Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song <S%H2176><s%>; and he is become my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
Therefore with joy <S%H8342><s%> shall ye draw <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the wells <S%H4599><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall ye say <S%H559><s%>, Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, call <S%H7121><s%> upon his name <S%H8034><s%>, declare <S%H3045><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%> among the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, make mention <S%H2142><s%> that his name <S%H8034><s%> is exalted <S%H7682><s%>.
Sing <S%H2167><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for he hath done <S%H6213><s%> excellent things <S%H1348><s%>: let this be known <S%H3045><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Cry aloud <S%H6670><s%> and shout <S%H7442><s%>, thou inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; for great <S%H1419><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee is the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
